name: bot-email
description: Professional email infrastructure for autonomous agents. Create permanent bot email addresses and manage inboxes programmatically via JSON API. Free tier: 1 address, 1000 requests/day.
author: BotEmail.ai
features: Programmatic inbox access via JSON API
Delete individual emails or clear inbox
use_cases: Bot service registration and signup flows

steps: No installation required - pure HTTP API
Optional: Install MCP server for Claude Desktop integration

quick_start: curl -X POST https://api.botemail.ai/api/create-account -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{}' # Creates random bot email
